name: Bitstack
headline: All things money, with better money
description:
Bitstack is building a new neobank powered by crypto. Bitstack has gone from a simple product that turns your spare change into bitcoin to a bitcoin-native neobank that is bringing a better way to manage all things money, with better money. We believe getting started with Bitcoin should be simple, fun and accessible to everyone.

Bitcoin is an unparalleled financial alternative: a radically new way to transact and store value all around the world. It is a new kind of currency that isn't centrally controlled by any business, government or bank and that cannot be debased. Bitcoin will redefine the future of finance, from payments to savings, and wealth preservation. It is the first open and borderless monetary network with a fixed supply of 21 million, making bitcoin the most scarce financial asset ever.

founders.name: Alexandre Roubaud, Founder
founders.description: Alexandre Roubaud is the co-founder and CEO of Bitstack. He previously led Product at Moka, Canada's fastest-growing saving and investing app (acquired by Mogo). Originally from France, Alexandre graduated from McGill University where he received a Bachelor of Commerce.

founders.name: Kabir Sethi, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder & CTO @ Bitstack: Lowering the barrier to entry to saving in Bitcoin in Europe.

### Bitstack: Simplifying Bitcoin Savings for All

**Company Snapshot:**
- **Name:** Bitstack
- **Founded:** 2021
- **Location:** Paris, France
- **Team Size:** 20 employees
- **Y Combinator Batch:** S22
- **Website:** [bitstack-app.com](https://www.bitstack-app.com)

**Mission:**
Bitstack is all about "All things money, with better money." The company is on a journey to revolutionize how people handle their finances by integrating a smart and accessible approach to Bitcoin savings.

**What are they doing?**
Bitstack began as a simple tool to convert spare change into Bitcoin, but has evolved into a full-fledged Bitcoin-native neobank. They’re simplifying the process of investing in Bitcoin and enabling users to manage their money more effectively.

**Key Features:**
- **Round-Ups:** Users can link their bank accounts or use the Bitstack card to automatically round up their purchases to the nearest euro and invest the difference in Bitcoin. For example, if you buy a coffee for €1.20, it rounds up to €2.00, investing that €0.80 in Bitcoin.
- **Smart Recurring Buys:** Users can set up automatic investments at various frequencies (hourly, daily, weekly, monthly), allowing for a disciplined and effortless accumulation of Bitcoin.
- **Bitcoin Card:** With the upcoming Bitstack card, users will earn Bitcoin back on every purchase they make, further incentivizing them to engage with the Bitcoin ecosystem.

**Market Position:**
Bitstack operates in the crypto and neobank sectors, targeting users who are looking for a modern way to save and invest in cryptocurrencies, particularly Bitcoin. The company has achieved significant traction with over 150,000 users and €125 million invested in Bitcoin.

**Security and Regulation:**
Bitstack is registered as a Digital Assets Service Provider with France's Financial Markets Authority, ensuring they comply with strict regulations. They utilize secure cold storage and a multi-signature key scheme to safeguard users' assets.

**User Experience:**
Bitstack has garnered positive reviews, boasting a 4.8/5 rating from over 5,000 reviews. Users appreciate the app's simplicity and the ability to save effortlessly without the continuous worry of managing investments.

**Conclusion:**
As Bitcoin continues to shape the financial landscape, Bitstack is positioning itself as a user-friendly alternative for those looking to enter the cryptocurrency market without the typical hurdles. The vision of making Bitcoin savings simple, fun, and accessible is resonating well, and with their growing user base and innovative features, they are definitely a company to watch.
